normalized: spreading out on the opposite side of the gosha academy school building, a forest that was dark, even in the afternoon…
the size of the virgin forest, which had been protected and kept untouched since ancient times, was about 300 hectares.
the interior of the protected forest, however, concealed a wide variety of the taimanin forces' facilities, such as training, command, research, and medical facilities.
they were camouflaged by the foliage, deceiving the eyes of all overhead surveillance.
established to focus on the understanding of science, technology and ninja arts, they were a central part of the hidden village.
in a section of those underground facilities, ten or so shinobi had assembled, which now included asagi, murasaki and sakura.
almost nobody was sitting in a chair within the inorganic room.
people leaning on the wall, people sitting on the floor with their eyes closed―they were each waiting for the briefing to start in their own way.
the eyes of asagi, who stood leaning against the wall most distant from the entrance, were half-closed.
murasaki stood immediately next to her, her eyes pointed towards the senior shinobi, who, though quiet, were giving off a quite dangerous vibe.

name: sakura
normalized: heey, murasaki.
sakura raised a relaxed voice from murasaki's other side.

name: sakura
normalized: kurou-shan isn't here right now?
sakura asked, while idly poking her with the index finger of her crossed arm.

name: murasaki
normalized: ani-ue is on a mission.
yatsu kurou.
murasaki's biological brother, a shinobi who acted as asagi's partner.

name: murasaki
normalized: sakura also asked at the last briefing… didn't you listen?

name: sakura
normalized: was that so?

name: murasaki
normalized: seriously…

“she's an idiot, she's an idiot,” i think on a regular basis, but i want to at least follow the example of sakura's courage… murasaki lamented, while over- whelmed by the grave feeling given off by her seniors.
there were just under forty taimanin in active service, but more than half that number had left the hidden village, responding to calls, which happened a lot these days.
the activities of “those guys” had become that incessant.
taimanin could only fight against the expansion of the forces of darkness, and while they urgently needed reinforcements, they were always one step behind.

name: man
normalized: i'm late.
is everyone here?
the door opened, and an aged man entered the room.
among all the people dressed in shinobi outfits, a normal tailored suit stood out.
yamamoto nobushige.
directly commanding the taimanin forces, he was the front line commander, so to speak.
taimanin forces were no exception to the rule of civilian control, and murasaki had heard that yamamoto was from the sebiro group at the ministry of defence.
(tl: literally “business suit”, the sebiro group is a nickname for the non-uniformed, suit-wearing higher-ups at theministry.
he seemed like a suitably sharp figure, and even the taimanin, who tended to dislike the sebiro group, respected yamamoto's seniority.

name: yamamoto
normalized: i'll tell you the gist first.
twenty minutes ago, an urgent request came in from the government, and i accepted it.
it's a mission.
the man the taimanin called 『director yamamoto』 briefly announced, while looking over everyone present.
the long-service shinobi had become silently excited at the prospect of a new battle.
was it due to the nature of the taimanin, who were more at home in war than in peace?

name: asagi
normalized: fuh…
murasaki surreptitiously watched a little smile grow on asagi's lips.

name: yamamoto
normalized: also, i have a report for you.
it has been decided that our taimanin forces will officially be integrated into an organization and become part of the government.

name: taimanin
normalized: public safety?

name: taimanin
normalized: or is it the ministry of defence?

name: sakura
normalized: foreign affairs would be good.
we could go on trips.

name: murasaki
normalized: idiot.

name: sakura
normalized: ehehe.

name: yamamoto
normalized: of course, it's public safety.
you probably won't be in another secret living space.
we are all being assigned to the newly organized public safety intelligence agency third investigation division, ＜section three＞.

name: yamamoto
normalized: legally, this means i have become section three's g-man.
i've finally become a good enough public servant.

name: asagi
normalized: i wonder if we can put our taxi fares on expenses?
the shinobi, who were sitting in a row, suddenly grew excited by asagi's frivolous talk.

name: yamamoto
normalized: some inconveniences will emerge, but this way we can freely request a larger budget.

name: yamamoto
normalized: i intend to modernize our equipment even further during this period.
ladies and gentlemen, i look forward to your activities hereafter.

name: taimanin
normalized: yes…!

with daring expressions, the taimanin all nodded at the words of the man with the glint in his eye, who was “looking forward to” their unparalleled work, which hadn't stopped at all since time immemorial.

name: asagi
normalized: and so, director-dono.
what's our first mission, as of becoming government workers?

name: yamamoto
normalized: hmm.
unusually for him, yamamoto curved his facial muscles into a shape resembling a smile.

name: yamamoto
normalized: i wonder if you've heard of something called tokyo kingdom?

name: asagi
normalized: a man-made island floating on tokyo bay.
the remains of a former government building policy.
i've heard it's being broken up now.

name: asagi
normalized: even the dwellers of hell flow into the local refugees and criminals.
it seems it's become a sort of lawless district.

name: yamamoto
normalized: quite so.
information has come in, confirming the concealment of terrorist organizations in that troublesome area.

name: taimanin
normalized: terrorist?
where is the source of this information, director?

name: yamamoto
normalized: a tip.
there was a call to the jurisdiction's police station, and from an investigation after that, we have come to suspect the involvement of an “uncertain” influence.

name: sakura
normalized: the influence of hell…

name: yamamoto
normalized: that's why the call was made to us.
this time, it'll be an infiltration and investigation mission.

name: asagi
normalized: hmm… i feel uneasy about the matter of the tip to the police.

name: yamamoto
normalized: indeed.
that's also worrying me.
since, if the police functioned normally in the first place, it wouldn't be called a lawless town.
but that being said, there won't be an investigation if we don't go.
murasaki also felt asagi's concern.
incidents where taimanin were dispatched occurred often these days, and most of the taimanin had left the hidden village.
if they used even more personnel on this, it might cut the number of taimanin remaining in the village down to ten.
“too many incidents are occurring”―it had reached the point where most of the taimanin held that feeling.

name: murasaki
normalized: （maybe it's needless worry, though… the location of this hidden village shouldn't be known to the enemy, after all.

name: yamamoto
normalized: now, i will report the members for the infiltration investigation.
yamamoto named three strong taimanin.

name: sakura
normalized: ah, this is beyond our fighting capability.

name: asagi
normalized: personnel selected for the investigation, huh?
sakura, murasaki and asagi (who had the greatest ability), stepped forward.

name: yamamoto
normalized: and one more thing.
we have intelligence that the 『chaos arena』 has been resurrected.
tension ran through everyone in the area due to yamamoto's words.

name: asagi
normalized: chaos arena…!
murasaki didn't fail to notice the expressions of asagi, and especially sakura, clouding over slightly.
chaos arena――
that was the name of the illegal stadium that had once been destroyed by asagi's own hands, as well as the crime syndicate that operated it.
murasaki had personally participated in the cleanup operation after the collapse of the chaos arena, and had witnessed the demise of that appalling arena of death.
asagi and sakura had sustained deep wounds from the conflict of the chaos arena, particularly in that asagi's lover had been caught up in the affair and lost his life.
why had that chaos arena now, once more…

name: asagi
normalized: no way, oboro's…?!
yamamoto shook his head at asagi, who had raised her beautiful eyebrows.

name: yamamoto
normalized: no, that name is not in the report.
it is said to have been rebuilt by another figure.
oboro.
the leader of the destroyed chaos arena, a woman whom asagi had killed in mortal combat.
she was a shinobi boss who was affiliated with the forces of darkness.

name: asagi
normalized: another figure?

name: murasaki
normalized: asagi-sama…
yamamoto's voice reached murasaki's ears as she looked up at asagi, who, unusually, was exposing her emotions during a mission.

name: yamamoto
normalized: that's right.
that figure is a man connected to you, and to murasaki.

name: murasaki
normalized: to me?

name: yamamoto
normalized: indeed.
a man you assassinated during the search-and- destroy operation against the remaining members of the arena.
it's the “demonologist”, kiryuu sabato.

name: murasaki
normalized: kiryuu…!
sabato…
kiryuu, sabato…
